source:
TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Horthur is concerned about one of his fellow miners.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>Règle spéciale<var 1D /var>:  synchronisation de quête<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Horthur vous regarde comme s'il avait une faveur à vous demander.

source:
TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_SEQ_01<tab>Horthur, one of the leading figures among the miners of Twine, is worried about Kee-Satt, the sole Mystel member of the community. He claims that not only is the young man surly and uncommunicative, but that he also refuses to dig in the same locations as his colleagues, instead opting for those that have little chance of yielding anything of value. Horthur senses that as Kee-Satt is unwilling to confide in any of his peers, he may be more likely to share his troubles with an outsider such as yourself.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_SEQ_01<tab>Horthur vous a demandé d'aller enquêter auprès de l'étrange Mystel qui passe son temps à creuser dans les mines épuisées de la région. Allez trouver Kee-Satt.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_SEQ_02<tab>Kee-Satt turns out to be far more talkative than you were led to believe, and once he starts, it is as if the floodgates have been opened. He tells you of his dream to revive the methods once used in Nabaath Areng to produce a versatile alloy known as Nabaathium. However, one essential piece of the puzzle is yet to be found: the elusive ore known as rutabite. Kee-Satt has been searching for a vein for quite some time, though he is reluctant to turn to his Ronso peers for help because of their prejudiced views on Mystel. He is determined to prove himself as a skilled miner, despite their claims otherwise, and he asks you to accompany him to Nuvy's Leavings and act as witness to the moment he finally discovers rutabite.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_SEQ_02<tab>Kee-Satt vous a expliqué qu'il cherchait à reproduire l'ancien procédé de fabrication du nabaathium, mais qu'il n'arrivait pas à mettre la main sur de la lutahvite, un composant crucial de ce fameux métal. Vous avez accepté de l'aider dans sa quête, retrouvez-le aux mines abandonnées de Nuvy.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_SEQ_03<tab>You find Kee-Satt attempting, largely unsuccessfully, to defend himself from a beast that has wandered into this section of the mines. Leaping to his aid, you put down the fiend without so much as breaking a sweat.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez terrassé sans transpirer le monstre qui menaçait Kee-Satt. Allez lui porter assistance.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_SEQ_04<tab>Kee-Satt is extremely grateful for your timely arrival and is impressed by the ease with which you disposed of such a vicious creature. Now that the shaking in his hands has subsided and he is once again able to hold a pickaxe, he can continue digging for rutabite.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_SEQ_04<tab>Kee-Satt a été très im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>né par votre puissance, et vous a remercié chaudement. Continuez de l'aider à réaliser son rêve.
TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_000<tab>Salut, voyageu<var 08 E905 ((se)) ((r)) /var><var 1D /var>! J'peux te d'mander un service<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_001<tab>As you've no doubt noticed, most of Twine's miners are Ronso. There's a Mystel lad, though. The only one of his kind in the whole town.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_001<tab>La plupart des habitants de Queues-liées sont des Ronsos, vois-tu. Nous avons un seul Mystel parmi nous.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_002<tab>His name's Kee-Satt. A bit of a loner. Always digging by himself in places where you'll be lucky to find a few lumps of coal, never mind gems and such.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_002<tab>Ce Mystel s'appelle Kee-Satt, et j'peux te dire que c'est un énergumène... Il passe son temps à creuser tout seul dans une mine épuisée...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_003<tab>I often ask him why he doesn't mine the same spots as the rest of us, but he never gives me a proper answer. I daresay he would be more inclined to speak with an outsider, though.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_003<tab>J'ai plusieurs fois essayé de lui demander ce qu'il fabriquait, mais il refuse de répondre à qui que ce soit qui soit du coin. J'me disais qu'du coup, si c'était quelqu'un comme toi qui lui posait la question, il serait p't-être plus loquace...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_004<tab>If you could get the truth out of him, and see if anything is the matter, it would put my mind at ease.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_004<tab>J'imagine qu'en tant que voyage<var 08 E905 ((use)) ((ur)) /var>, t'as d'autres chats à fouetter, mais ça serait sympa que tu m'aides quand t'auras le temps.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_010<tab>Kee-Satt hardly speaks to anyone, and when he does, it's usually only when it's absolutely necessary.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_010<tab>Tu pourrais aller demander à Kee-Satt ce qu'il fabrique<var 1D /var>? C'est que ça me turlupine c't'histoire.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_020<tab>A traveler, eh? What do you want with me?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_020<tab>Salut, c'est toi l<var 08 E905 ((a)) ((e)) /var> voyage<var 08 E905 ((use)) ((ur)) /var> qui se promène dans les parrrages<var 1D /var>? Je peux t'aider<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_021<tab>"Lucky to find a couple of lumps of coal.“ Is that what he said? Hmph! Shows how much <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> knows!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_021<tab>Pourquoi je crrreuse dans une mine épuisée<var 1D /var>? Ha ha<var 1D /var>! Mais, c'est parce que je suis à la recherche de mon rêve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_022<tab>You, on the other hand, might be a better audience for my master plan. Have you ever heard of an alloy called Nabaathium? It's strong, light, and resistant to heat and friction.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_022<tab>Tu as déjà entendu parler du nabaathium<var 1D /var>? C'est un métal ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment solide, très résistant à la corrosion, le matérrriau parfait.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_023<tab>It was one of the most valuable metals in Nabaath Areng and a lot of their jewelry was made from the stuff. The trouble is, the techniques for mixing the alloy were lost to the Flood.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_023<tab>Avant le déluge de Lumière, on venait de très loin pour se procurer ce métal fabriqué à Nabaath Areng, tout Norvrandt se l'arrachait<var 1D /var>! Malheurrreusement, le secret de sa fabrication a été perdu lors de la destruction du royaume...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_024<tab>I've been looking for a way to make my own, and my search led me to a scroll that explains the methods, right down to the last detail.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_024<tab>Le mineurrr qui réussira à reproduire ce procédé laissera son nom dans l'histoire<var 1D /var>! C'est ça, mon rêve<var 1D /var>! Tout le monde connaîtra un jour le nom de Kee-Satt, tu peux me croire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_025<tab>After having a historian decipher it, I learned that I lacked one vital ingredient─rutabite. And that is what I am digging for.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_025<tab>Ça fait déjà plusieurs mois que je suis la piste du nabaathium<var 1D /var>! J'ai même trouvé un livre qui en donne la forrrmule exacte<var 1D /var>! Jusque là tout marchait comme sur des roulettes...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_026<tab>Short of venturing into the Empty, my next best option is to look for a vein here in Amh Araeng.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_026<tab>Mais figure-toi qu'il est fait mention d'un minerrrai que je ne connaissais pas, la lutahvite. J'ai eu beau creuser et tamiser, impossible de trouver cet ingrédient.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_100_026<tab>Of course, I'd stand a much better chance of finding one if I had help, but I'd rather not have to rely on anyone from around here.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_100_026<tab>Je suis certain qu'il y a une veine de luthavite quelque parrrt dans les mines d'Amh Araeng. Mais c'est une tâche titanesque à moi tout seul<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_027<tab>Some of the Ronso miners take exception to the fact I'm Mystel. They seem to think we're not built for this kind of work.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_027<tab>J'ai bien entendu demandé aux mineurrrs ronsos de la région de m'aider, mais sous prétexte que je suis un Mystel, ils passent leur temps à se ficher de moi, et pas un n'a accepté mon offre.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_028<tab>When I find that rutabite, they'll see how wrong they are.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_028<tab>Je me suis dit que j'allais leur faire regretter leurs moquerrries, et depuis je cherche ce minerai sans relâche<var 1D /var>! Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment je n'ai toujours pas réussi... Comme je suis tout seul, j'avance très lentement, et il reste encore beaucoup d'endroits que je n'ai pas pu examiner.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_029<tab>Hmph. You know, this is the first time I've said more than about two words to anyone in a while. And I feel better for getting that off my chest.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_029<tab>Ah, ça fait du bien de sortir ce que j'avais sur le cœur<var 1D /var>! Tu as un don pour fairrre parler les gens, toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_030<tab>This might be a bit sudden, but I have an idea. How would you like to see the moment I finally unearth that vein of ore?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_030<tab>Tu ne peux pas être là par hasard, voyage<var 08 E905 ((use)) ((ur)) /var>. Je dirrrais que tu es là pour... m'aider à réaliser mon rêve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_031<tab>Well, what I really mean is that I need someone there to act as a witness. Otherwise, the others might think I bought a lump of it from somewhere─ ludicrously expensive as it is─and am pretending to have dug it up myself. Will you do me this favor?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_031<tab>Ta tâche serrrait très simple, j'aurais juste besoin que tu sois mon témoin quand je finirai enfin par trrrouver la lutahvite. Évidemment, ça ne sera pas du volontariat<var 1D /var>! Ce ne sera pas grand-chose, mais je compte bien te rémunérer pour tes efforts.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_032<tab>You will? Thank you! Luckily, I've found the perfect spot for my next dig. If my miner's hunch is correct, the ore should be waiting just below the surface.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_032<tab>Super<var 1D /var>! Ne perrrdons pas de temps, allons tout de suite à l'endroit que j'ai repéré<var 1D /var>! J'ai bon espoir que cette fois soit la bonne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_033<tab>It's in Nuvy's Leavings, so I'll wait for you there!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_033<tab>Je parrrs devant<var 1D /var>! Retrouve-moi aux mines abandonnées de Nuvy<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_040<tab>So, he told you what's been bothering him? That's good. It's not my place to pry, but I'm glad he found someone to share his troubles with.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_HORTHUR_000_040<tab>Alors tu as parlé à Kee-Satt, à c'qui paraît<var 1D /var>! J'ai hâte que tu me racontes ce qu'il trafique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_050<tab>Phew! I'm glad that's over. How am I supposed to concentrate on my work with all of these creatures disturbing me!?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_050<tab>Ouf, tu es arrivé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> juste à temps<var 1D /var>! Je ne m'attendais pas à êtrrre attaqué par des monstres par ici... C'est plutôt calme, d'habitude.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_051<tab>You certainly know how to handle yourself, though. That fiend never stood a chance!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_051<tab>N'empêche que tu es trrrès fort<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> au combat<var 1D /var>! Tu n'as fait qu'une bouchée de ces bestioles, je suis très im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>né<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_052<tab>But I dread to think what would've happened if you hadn't shown up. Hopefully nothing else will try to get between me and my dream. Many thanks, my friend!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH101_03525_KEESATT_000_052<tab>Merci d'être venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> me sauver<var 1D /var>! Je me rrremets au travail tout de suite<var 1D /var>!
